sentences.sentence: Payment will be remitted to you in full.
sentences.translation: 报酬将会全额汇寄给你。

sentences.sentence: The case was remitted to the Court of Appeal.
sentences.translation: 这个案件被提交给了上诉法院。

sentences.sentence: He also took that old lawyer out of prison and remitted his fine.
sentences.translation: 他还把那个老律师从监狱里释放了出来，并退回了他的罚金。
